name: Robotechtor
description:
Robotechtor is a Bots Battle in a 3D Environment.

You have 5 Robot commando and you must destroy Mech to progress.

Each Robot have their own strength and their own weakness.

An energy bar allows you to activate the "Shield" mode for defense, "Fury"

to speed up your weapons or "Rage" for a special power.

Manage powers, ernergies and strategies to succeed in your progress.

Like a RTS (Real Time Strategy) select unit or group with screen touch.
